creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: netsuke in the form of a mask; red clay; frowning face with wide cheeks; wide nose; bulging eyes, looking up; thick brow; lines around mouth; 2013.29.1217.1-6 received attached to patterned orange, cream and blue ribbon (ribbon in poor condition--shredded)
title: Netsuke (mask)
